infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow SIET Bus Tracking to access your location while you use the app to show real-time journeys.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Allow SIET Bus Tracking to access your location even when the app is closed so that students can see live bus updates.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Allow SIET Bus Tracking to continue sharing your bus location when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Allow SIET Bus Tracking to access your location for live bus tracking.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow SIET Bus Tracking to access your location even when the app is closed so that students can see live bus updates.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow SIET Bus Tracking to access your location while you use the app.
